column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Amon says : " My quest for equality began many years ago .
#Text=You are about to get your answer .
#Text=Since the beginning of time , the spirits have acted as guardians of our world , and they have spoken to me .
#Text=They say the Avatar has failed humanity .
#Text=That is why the spirits have chosen me to usher in a new era of balance .
#Text=They have granted me a power that will make Equality a reality .
#Text=The power to take a person 's bending away .
#Text=Permanently .
#Text=" Korra says : " That 's impossible .
#Text=There 's no way .
#Text=" Mako says : " This guy 's insane !
#Text=" Amon says : " Now , for a demonstration .
#Text=Please welcome , Lightning Bolt Zolt .
#Text=Leader of the Triple Threat Triad , and one of the most notorious criminals in Republic City .
#Text=" Lightning Bolt Zolt says : " Ah , boo yourself !
#Text=" Korra says : " There 's Bolin .
#Text=" Mako says : " Wait , we ca n't fight them all .
#Text=We need to be smart about this .
#Text=" Korra says : " Then come up with a game plan , " Team Captain " .
#Text=" Amon says : " Zolt has amassed a fortune by extorting and abusing nonbenders .
#Text=But his reign of terror is about to come to an end .
#Text=Now , in the interest of fairness , I will give Zolt the chance to fight to keep his bending .
#Text=" Lightning Bolt Zolt says : " You 're gon na regret doing that , pal .
#Text="
